entry.title: Home for the Holidays by Madison Vining 16 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 16 oz Candle
Price: 26.60

The more you shop, the more you save! For a limited time, get $25 off $75, $35 off $100, or $50 off $150. Offers are applied to the order total, after additional discounts.

Home for the Holidays smells exactly like that: coming home for the holidays. It’s the warmth of a friendly hug when you walk through the door, the nostalgia of family traditions, and the joy of time spent together. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Madison @madisonviningblog.

"I wanted it to smell like, that is, the feeling of coming home to a place that is your soft place to land, where you're accepted and loved without question. I think we nailed it.

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time. This fresh and earthy fragrance features a moderate strength and an aroma of orange peel and sweet citrus with refreshing notes of apple, berry, and eucalyptus, intertwined in a nostalgic, cozy blend of balsam, pine, cedar, and sandalwood.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural, paraffin free soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Sulfate free, phthalate free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy Home for the Holidays in additional sizes and products.

Enjoy two candles in our Home for the Holidays by Madison Vining & Momma's Kitchen Bundle. These fragrances each feature a unique blend of fresh and cozy notes that are perfect for enjoying the time spent together.

Get each candle for only $26.60 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $22.80!)

Momma's Kitchen: cinnamon, apple, + pine (strong strength)
Home for the Holidays: balsam, citrus, + apple (moderate strength)

entry.title: Tree Farm Soy Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 18.00

Selling out, and going fast!

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Tree Farm is a trip down memory lane to favorite holiday traditions. It’s the joy of bundling up and heading to the tree farm to find the perfect Christmas tree with family. Walking through the trees, the air is filled with the scent of freshly trimmed evergreens, Fraser fir, and cedar. The familiar, cozy feeling of laughter and the excitement of bringing home a special tree to light up your home are truly the magic of the season.

This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Natalie @vintageporch, featuring a strong strength that is a staple for the season.

“It's the whole ‘family Christmas’ feeling you get when you smell the pine scent. You turn on the music…you light the candle...it’s CHRISTMAS!” 

The 4 oz Soy Wax Melts bag includes approximately 55 cubes for up to 65 hours to total fragrance burn time.

All our melts are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting burn every time. We use premium fragrance oils hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.! All melts are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.


WEIGHTS: 4.0 oz (113.4 g)
DIMENSIONS: 6.25" x 5.75"

entry.title: Country Pear Soy Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 18.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Country Pear is a cozy blend of fresh golden pear with rich plum, highlighted with brown sugar vanilla and soft notes of roasted hazelnut. With just 6-12 wax cubes in your warmer, this fruity and bakey fragrance gives you a moderate strength that effortlessly creates a cozy, homey feeling in any room.

The 4 oz Soy Wax Melts bag includes approximately 55 cubes for up to 65 hours to total fragrance burn time.

All our melts are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting burn every time. We use premium fragrance oils hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.! All melts are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.

DIMENSIONS: 6.25" x 5.75"

entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 16 oz Candle
Price: 26.60

Selling out for the season, and going fast! This scent will not return until next year.

Imagine stepping into a cozy, rustic cabin nestled deep in an evergreen forest. It’s the perfect companion for chilly nights and moments of quiet reflection.

Clove & Pine is a rustic, warm aroma of cinnamon bark, fresh clove, and citrus peel with a deep forest of pine, birch, sandalwood, and balsam fir, highlighted by smooth notes of herbs, suede, and smoky vanilla.

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time. This earthy fragrance takes you deep into an evergreen forest to a rustic wood cabin, filled with the warmth of a fire and rich spices.

entry.title: Spice Cake by Karlee Gail Bowman 16 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 16 oz Candle
Price: 38.00

Spice Cake by Karlee Gail Bowman is a cozy scent of spiced vanilla cake, intertwined with a warm, sweet medley of cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, ginger, and hazelnut. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Karlee @karleegailbowman!

“This cozy candle takes me back to baking in my parent's kitchen. It's spicy with a dark molasses and hazelnut creme, with a splash of my homemade vanilla. It has a spice that fills the air. If I close my eyes while I smell it, I'm home.”

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time. This spiced and bakey fragrance features a moderate strength that perfectly captures the nostalgic aroma of warm, spice cake baking in the oven.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy Spice Cake in additional sizes and products.

entry.title: Wick Trimmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Accessory
Price: 18.00

Wick trimmers are a must-have for candle care! This stainless steel Wick Trimmer is uniquely branded for your Antique Candle Co.® collection, combines luxury with utility, and is a great tool to ensure you get the most out of your candle. It is heavy duty yet lightweight to make trimming quick and easy. The round blades are ideal for making clean cuts and catching excess trimmings. Available in Black, Gold, or Silver.

Trimming your candle wick to 1/4" - 1/2" after each burn keeps your candle clean and helps it continue to burn evenly from start to finish. That means longer lasting candles and more YUMMY smells!

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.
